title: Can you list these events in chronological order? - Storming of the Bastille - Signing of the Declaration of Independence - Death of Robespierre - Ratification of the Constitution - Parisian Women’s Bread March - Death of King Louis XVI - Quora

response.answer_text: Signing of the Declaration of Independence - 2 August 1776 Ratification of the US Constitution - 21 June 1788 Storming of the Bastile - 14 July 1789 Parisian Women's Bread March - 5 October 1789 Execution of King Louis XVI - 21 January 1793 Death of Robespierre - 28 July 1794
